document.name: AuditList
document.documentation: This transient document is used to display Audit list grids. Either from the DB only; or (if enabled) archived and DB Audits.

condition.name: showNonArchived
condition.documentation: Show non-archived Audits (ie, in the database)

condition.name: showArchived
condition.documentation: Show archived Audits, overriden in extension
